name: Kenku
description: Kenku are a race of flightless, avian humanoids known for their mimicry and cunning. They are often found in cities as thieves, spies, or artisans. Kenku cannot create new sounds or speak in their own voices; instead, they mimic the voices and sounds they have heard. Despite this limitation, Kenku are clever, resourceful, and have an uncanny ability to imitate others perfectly.
languages: You can read and write Common and Auran, but you can only speak by mimicking sounds and voices you have heard.
special: Mimicry: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Insight check against your Charisma (Deception) check.
